next_step: Charge Sheet;Witness Statements,Consult a lawyer;Attend court;Gather evidence

description: Disputes between individuals or organizations
next_step: Property Documents,File a lawsuit;Attempt mediation

description: Cases related to marriage, divorce, and child custody
next_step: Divorce Petition;Child Custody Papers,File a petition;Attend court hearings

description: Disputes regarding land and property ownership
next_step: Property Tax Receipts;Encumbrance Certificate,Verify documents;Consult a property lawyer

description: Cases related to consumer rights violations,Invoice
next_step: Warranty Card;Complaint Letter,File a consumer complaint;Seek compensation

description: Legal matters involving businesses and corporations
next_step: Financial Statements;Business Agreements,Consult a corporate lawyer;Review contracts

description: Disputes related to workplace and labor rights
next_step: Salary Slips;Termination Letter,Report to labor department;File a case if necessary

description: Cases related to tax disputes and compliance
next_step: Audit Reports;PAN Card,Consult a tax advisor;File a tax dispute appeal

description: Issues related to patents, copyrights, and trademarks,Patent Certificate
next_step: Trademark Registration;Copyright Documents,Register your IP;File infringement case if needed

description: Cases involving fundamental rights and government policies,Government Orders;Court Judgments;Petitions,File a writ petition
next_step: Petitions,File a writ petition;Seek legal counsel

description: Cases concerning environmental violations and regulations,Environmental Clearance;Pollution Reports;Government Notices,Report violation
next_step: Government Notices,Report violation;File a case in environmental court

description: Cases related to internet fraud, hacking, and online crime,Cyber Crime Report;Screenshots;Transaction Details,Report to cyber cell
next_step: Screenshots;Transaction Details,Report to cyber cell;File a legal complaint

description: Cases concerning human rights violations,Affidavits
next_step: Police Reports;NGO Statements,File a petition in the Human Rights Commission

description: Cases involving discrimination, equal protection, and human rights violations.
next_step: Evidence of discrimination, civil rights law references, witness statements;File complaints with civil rights organizations or take legal action in federal courts.

description: Cases ensuring legal rights such as fair trials, legal representation, and procedural fairness.
next_step: Court orders, legal defense filings, rights violation evidence;Appeal to a higher court or seek a judicial review.

description: Cases concerning free speech, religious rights, and press freedom.
next_step: Government actions, constitutional references, media content evidence;File a case under constitutional law or with the Supreme Court.

description: Cases related to the legal process for prosecuting crimes, including due process and fair trial rights.
next_step: Police reports, arrest warrants, court proceedings;Engage a defense attorney, prepare for trial, or negotiate plea agreements.

description: Cases related to personal privacy, data protection, or surveillance laws.
next_step: Privacy agreements, evidence of breach, data protection policies;File a complaint with regulatory authorities or pursue civil litigation.

description: Disputes over federal tax laws, IRS regulations, or tax fraud cases.
next_step: Tax returns, financial audits, IRS notices;File a case with the Tax Court or appeal to higher authorities.

description: Cases involving business regulations, trade, and financial laws.
next_step: Business licenses, financial reports, regulatory compliance documents;File complaints with regulatory bodies or take legal action in business courts.

description: Cases that determine the authority and limits of the judicial branch.
next_step: Court rulings, constitutional references, judicial precedents;File under constitutional review or in appellate cour

description: Cases related to labor unions, collective bargaining, and employment disputes.
next_step: Employment contracts, union agreements, labor law references;Seek arbitration, mediation, or file with the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB).

description: Disputes over the division of powers between state and federal governments.
next_step: Constitutional references, legislative acts, case precedents;File with the Supreme Court if it concerns constitutional law.

description: Cases related to legal malpractice, misconduct, or bar association regulations.
next_step: Attorney-client agreements, malpractice claims, bar certification;File a complaint with the Bar Association, pursue disciplinary action, or seek legal redress.

description: Cases that do not fit into standard legal categories but still require judicial intervention.
next_step: Case-specific documents depending on the nature of the dispute;Consult a legal expert to determine the correct jurisdiction and legal approach.

description: Cases involving legal disputes between two or more states or their citizens.
next_step: Legal agreements, interstate contracts, historical precedents;File in federal court or the Supreme Court under Article III jurisdiction.

description: Disputes between private individuals or organizations, often involving contracts or property rights.
next_step: Contract agreements, evidence of damages, witness statements;File a lawsuit in civil court, seek mediation, or negotiate a settlement.
